comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I don't understand why the Pictorial History committed dated this as 1915 instead of 1914 when Callahan was not still manager in 1915, and the Sox played at the Polo Grounds on 5/26/14, the date written on the negative. www.baseball-reference.com/teams/CHW/1914-schedule-scores...

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
artolog:

Excellent point!  It seems more accurate to go with the date on the negative, since it is actually backed up by the time Callahan was managing Chicago, and is a date they would have been in NYC. Thank you for providing the source for the information, as that will make it easier to update this record with new details.
